alert.note: Alert for Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:14PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WORCESTER AND EASTERN HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 613 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Brookfield, or 13 miles west of Worcester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated and police department reported tree down in Warren, MA at 557 PM EDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Auburn, Oxford, Charlton, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Sturbridge, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Brookfield and East Brookfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
